name: Bodoblankets.com
tag_list: baby-blanket, blanket, throw-blanket, charity, one-for-one, humanitarian, benefactor, bodoblanket, afghan, knit, knitted, made-in-usa, recycled, organic, bodoblankets-com, tomsshoes, toms-shoes
overview:
Bodoblankets.com is the maker of a fine line of blankets. Our designers have done work for such renowned companies as Philips Van Heusen, L.L. Bean and Pendleton. We are a proud member of the One for One movement. This movement leverages consumer purchasing power to provide sustainable benefits to society.

Bodoblankets.com was founded on the following three core values:

  1. Charity: For every blanket purchased, we donate one.
  2. Green: Environmentally friendly organic and recycled yarns.
  3. Domestic: All blankets are 100% made in the USA.

It’s revolutionary. Customer becomes humanitarian and warm nights are distributed more quickly and efficiently to those in need.
